alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations; East Platte County; Niobrara County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 4:55PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Niobrara, northeastern Platte and east central Converse Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 454 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles west of Keeline, or 18 miles east of Douglas, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Keeline around 520 PM MDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Lost Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Converse County Lower Elevations; East Platte County; Niobrara County
